verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> reigns! <WH4427> Let the earth <WH776> rejoice! <WH1523> Let the multitude <WH7227> of islands <WH339> be glad! <WH8055>
Clouds <WH6051> and darkness <WH6205> are around <WH5439> him. <WH6664> Righteousness and justice <WH4941> are the foundation <WH4349> of his throne. <WH3678>
A fire <WH784> goes <WH3212> before <WH6440> him, <WH3857> and burns up his adversaries <WH6862> on every side. <WH5439>
His lightning <WH1300> lights <WH215> up the world. <WH8398> The earth <WH8398> sees, <WH7200> and trembles. <WH2342>
The mountains <WH2022> melt <WH4549> like wax <WH1749> at the presence <WH6440> of Yahweh, <WH3068> at the presence <WH6440> of the Lord <WH113> of the whole earth. <WH776>
The heavens <WH8064> declare <WH5046> his righteousness. <WH6664> All the peoples <WH5971> have seen <WH7200> his glory. <WH3519>
Let all them be shamed <WH954> who serve <WH5647> engraved images, <WH6459> who boast <WH1984> in their idols. <WH457> Worship <WH7812> him, <WH430> all you gods!
Zion <WH6726> heard <WH8085> and was glad. <WH8055> The daughters <WH1323> of Judah <WH3063> rejoiced, <WH1523> because of your judgments, <WH4941> Yahweh. <WH3068>
For you, <WH3068> Yahweh, are most high above <WH5945> all the earth. <WH776> You are exalted <WH5927> far above <WH3966> all gods. <WH430>

You who love <WH157> Yahweh, <WH3068> hate <WH8130> evil. <WH7451> He preserves <WH8104> the souls <WH5315> of his saints. <WH2623> He delivers <WH5337> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked. <WH7563>
Light <WH216> is sown <WH2232> for the righteous, <WH6662> and gladness <WH8057> for the upright <WH3477> in heart. <WH3820>
Be glad <WH8055> in Yahweh, <WH3068> you righteous <WH6662> people! <WH3034> Give thanks to his holy <WH6944> Name. <WH2143>
